message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been highly valued by many satisfied customers. I believe it would be a great addition to your collection. I am offering it to you for $100. Let me know if this works for you!
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your enthusiasm for your product. However, $100 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $80 for it. Let me know if that works for you.

Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. I understand your budget constraints and am willing to meet you halfway. I am proposing to sell the product to you for $90. Please let me know if this offer suits you.
